display_long_description:
# In IYO, your environment becomes a puzzle play zone. Shapes appear in your real-world spaces in mixed reality and bounce off your walls and furniture. 

Here’s what you can expect:

- **Dynamic challenges:** No matter the layout of your room, shapes will appear and respond to your space. Different rooms will make different challenges. 
- **Lots of levels:** You’ll have hours of fun with this 3D puzzle game with more than 20 levels to solve.
- **Settle down and relax:** Whether seated or standing it’s cozy time! Take your time to make perfect matches at your own pace
- **Puzzling persistence:** The puzzles get harder as the game progresses. But you’ll get better at solving them the more you play. Can you merge all the shapes to create the least number of color clusters? 
- **Get tactile:** Using hand-tracking or controllers, you can point at an object to select it and send it bouncing off your walls to merge with shapes of the same color.

[media]

Iyo's goal is to merge shapes of the same colour. This mixed-reality game uses your environment, bounce shapes off your furniture or walls to complete each level.
- Select a shape with your hand or a controller, by pointing at it. A white circle will appear in the selected shape. Once selected you can pinch or use the trigger button then pull back to apply force to the shape.
- If you don't have enough space consider turning off furniture collisions in the settings.
display_long_description_unprocessed:
# In IYO, your environment becomes a puzzle play zone. Shapes appear in your real-world spaces in mixed reality and bounce off your walls and furniture. 

Here’s what you can expect:

- **Dynamic challenges:** No matter the layout of your room, shapes will appear and respond to your space. Different rooms will make different challenges. 
- **Lots of levels:** You’ll have hours of fun with this 3D puzzle game with more than 20 levels to solve.
- **Settle down and relax:** Whether seated or standing it’s cozy time! Take your time to make perfect matches at your own pace
- **Puzzling persistence:** The puzzles get harder as the game progresses. But you’ll get better at solving them the more you play. Can you merge all the shapes to create the least number of color clusters? 
- **Get tactile:** Using hand-tracking or controllers, you can point at an object to select it and send it bouncing off your walls to merge with shapes of the same color.

![{"height":720,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/38982672_1554993268489732_4874301947246602872_n.mp4?_nc_cat=103&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=fSAhNp-GqOwQ7kNvwG_Vnhn&_nc_oc=AdnV_3A_jmACXWz_w7xTuNXPhrUiAAsMkeh5Mqza0XOWSDtFTiTGHEf2I0XLRdugFCk&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=0FaNOLbNQEvuERkUdp1fKA&oh=00_AfJ4H7cl76Jh06OX6qphH4bmAbdRAnDippMtdYzlKkkwlQ&oe=6821A906)

Iyo's goal is to merge shapes of the same colour. This mixed-reality game uses your environment, bounce shapes off your furniture or walls to complete each level.
- Select a shape with your hand or a controller, by pointing at it. A white circle will appear in the selected shape. Once selected you can pinch or use the trigger button then pull back to apply force to the shape.
- If you don't have enough space consider turning off furniture collisions in the settings.
